```{r setup}
library(nflKOSA)
```

```{r}
# load our data (not a generalizable function)
load("data/schs.rda")
load("data/winrecord.rda")
# function
ret <- nflKOSA::KOSA_sim_anneal(schs =  schs,
                         winrecord = winrecord,
                         iters = 1e1, 
                         coolingB = 1e-3,
                         initTemp = 1)

```
